General.Name: Chengdu Bright Eye Hospital Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Chengdu Bright Eye Hospital Co., Ltd. operates a chain of ophthalmology medical institutions in China. Its ophthalmology institutions provide services in the areas of refractive surgery, medical optometry glasses, cataract, glaucoma, strabismus in children, ocular fundus disease, and cornea and ocular surface. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: No. 215, First Ring Road, Chengdu, China, 610084
